svg:

Input:- ASP.NET MVC (Framework or Core)- Angular (Latest version), React- EntityFramework CodeFirst approach - Any Framework for Unit tests (ACTUAL)Output:- .NET 7 (std version) or .NET6 (LTSC version and recommended by Microsoft for business apps and large projects) anyway I going to focus by .NET 7 because I mean that Framework it's legacy nowadays- Currently the current version is 15, great, but there is a but, I have never worked with it and this is the first project where I will use this APICurrently the current version is 15, great, but there is a but, I have never worked with it and this is the first project where I will use this API.-I rarely worked with databases, but I will try to catch up. Well I wrote unit tests and used by the xUnit and FluentAssertions also tried to use Moq.Technical stackWe need to build URL Shortener. The goals are to create an application that will shorten any URL and to have possibility to navigate by this short equivalent.There are such views: Login view, Short URLs Table view, Short URL Info view, Aboutview. Adding some Unit tests will be a huge plus.Task
